title: Deere 750 Grain Drill - Half Speed Gear Problems

tasks.task: Adjusting seed cups for cover crops in a grain drill
subtasks: Moving lever to adjust seed cups width
Ensuring seeds flow easily when cups are too narrow
Obtaining the correct replacement gear ($300) for smaller seed rates
Attaching the replacement gear with a roll pin
Removing the old gear due to space constraints and difficult access
Considering improvements for future gear changes (e.g., press)

tasks.task: Maintaining various parts of the grain drill
